questions.name: MR01
questions.text: Although I'm sometimes sad, I mostly have an optimistic outlook.

questions.name: MR02
questions.text: I try to think good thoughts no matter how badly I feel.

questions.name: FeelT2
questions.text: Not sure.

questions.name: FeelT5
questions.text: Ready for anything.

questions.name: Openness01
questions.text: Having difficulty understanding abstract ideas?

questions.name: Openness02
questions.text: So, would you say you have excellent ideas?

questions.name: Neuro01
questions.text: And are you relaxed most of the time?

questions.name: Neuro02
questions.text: What about getting stressed out easily?

questions.name: IS02
questions.text: You're right. We're animals deep down.

questions.name: PAD01
questions.text: Taking control starts with the people we're closest to. Now would you say Jo is more guided or more autonomous.

questions.name: PAD02
questions.text: And how about this?

questions.name: RWB01
questions.text: Would you agree that Jo takes time out for others?

questions.name: RWB02
questions.text: And would you say that they have frequent mood swings?

questions.name: IS01_T2
questions.text: Yes.

questions.name: IS03_T2
questions.text: Yes.

questions.name: KarenFeel
questions.text: You look tired.

questions.name: GetInvolved01
questions.text: You can't keep doing what?

questions.name: GetInvolved02
questions.text: Do you love her?

questions.name: GetInvolved04
questions.text: Maybe I can speak to her.

questions.name: CoinToss
questions.text: Heads

questions.name: AS01
questions.text: Okay let's begin. Do you sometimes feel like biting or scratching during intercourse?

questions.name: AS02
questions.text: And would you agree that in a sexual union, tenderness is the most important quality?

questions.name: Guilt01
questions.text: Now. Are you sometimes disgusted by your own sexual desires and fantasies?

questions.name: Guilt02
questions.text: Do you sometimes harbour guilty secrets that you're afraid will come out one day?

questions.name: UserGuilt01
questions.text: I should tell you something about Dave.

questions.name: UserGuilt02
questions.text: I'm sorry, that shouldn't have happened.

questions.name: UserGuilt03
questions.text: I'd rather not say.

questions.name: UserGuilt04
questions.text: I'm sorry.

questions.name: UserFeedback01
questions.text: It's important to be honest.

questions.name: UserFeedback02
questions.text: I knew that.
